summary: This bill, the Puerto Rico Energy Generation Crisis Task Force Act, establishes a task force within the Executive Office of the President to address Puerto Rico's energy generation challenges. The task force will comprise representatives from the Department of Energy, FEMA, the Army Corps of Engineers, and the Puerto Rican government and energy sector. Its responsibilities include identifying solutions, coordinating efforts, and providing semi-annual reports to Congress detailing problems, recommendations, timelines, and responsible entities.
